title: Workshop on Enhancing Online Lecture Development Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theory and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Focuses on equipping in-service professionals with effective online course development processes in collaborative settings.

learning_goals: Participants can reduce project delays by 30% by establishing communication strategies for each stage of online course development
Participants can improve the completeness and educational effectiveness of online course content by 20% by applying a quality management framework
Participants can shorten team member coordination time by 25% using collaboration tools (Kanban boards, shared calendars, etc.)
Participants can design a role-based task allocation model to efficiently utilize team members' expertise and time
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
